3687179132.given_title: It is time to auction slots at congested airports | CEPR
3687179132.resolved_title: It is time to auction slots at congested airports
3687179132.excerpt: The COVID-19 pandemic has led to a substantial drop in air travel. Valuable time slots at major airports in the EU and elsewhere are largely allocated based on a use-it-or-lose-it scheme. However, airlines currently cannot use the slots to a sufficient degree and are at the risk of losing them.

3492948843.excerpt: Auction theory is an applied branch of economics which deals with how people act in auction markets and researches the properties of auction markets.

582066236.excerpt: A Vickrey–Clarke–Groves (VCG) auction is a type of sealed-bid auction of multiple items. Bidders submit bids that report their valuations for the items, without knowing the bids of the other bidders.

3253822538.excerpt: Entering an art auction for the first time is a confusing and intimidating experience for most. Within those storied halls of Christie’s, Phillips, and Sotheby’s exists a very unique etiquette and set of rules, some more obvious than others.

2995259342.given_title: Private Sales at Auction Houses Are Thriving for Three Key Reasons - Artsy
2995259342.resolved_title: Auction Houses Attract Collectors with Private Sales for Three Key Reasons
2995259342.excerpt: Over the past few months, private sales at auction houses have surged—predominantly because in-person, public sales are no longer possible. While salesroom floors have remained empty, collectors have continued to purchase art from Sotheby’s, Christie’s, and Phillips, especially online.

1.caption: Frank Stella’s Delaware Crossing and Picasso’s Femme assise sur une chaise from the collection of A. Alfred Taubman are displayed as part of the Frieze week exhibition at Sotheby’s on October 10, 2015 in London, England. Photo by Tristan Fewings/Getty Images for Sotheby’s.

3711447088.given_title: Auction Houses and Galleries Are Working Together—Here’s Why
3711447088.resolved_title: Auction Houses and Galleries Are Working Together—Here’s Why
3711447088.excerpt: Purchasing art via auction is very different from buying art at a gallery. At auctions, prices are transparent, all are welcome to bid, and the highest bidder wins the artwork. At galleries, the process for acquiring a piece—and the price of the piece itself—can be much more opaque.

3522569359.resolved_title: The Wild, Wonderful World of Estate Sales
3522569359.excerpt: An estate sale is only a true estate sale if the homeowner is dead. If the owner is living, then it’s a tag sale, though many people use the terms interchangeably.

2.caption: Unlike the auction world, the estate-sale world is unregulated—there are no official rules for how much companies can charge for their services.

3.caption: Online sales that were hosted by estate-sale companies proved extraordinarily lucrative during the pandemic.

Auctions have a long history.
